newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Swedish shares end higher on Q1 reports, Ericsson.
newsitem.headline: Swedish shares end higher on Q1 reports, Ericsson.

text.p: Swedish shares ended higher on Thursday, boosted by first quarter earnings reports, a strong performance by telecoms group Ericsson and the forestry sector as well as by a stronger U.S. market.
The Stockholm general index rose 1.16 percent to 2,639.09 in turnover 4.96 billion crowns.
Ericsson rose 8.5 crowns to 252.5 ahead of releasing its first quarter report on Friday and U.S. computer group IBM
